description: Defines the OceanTheme class for Flutter, providing theme data and color schemes for an application's consistent styling.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing theme data and color schemes for the Ocean design language.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with Ocean's light theme specifications.

methods.name: headerGradient
methods.description: Provides a LinearGradient used for headers and app bars with Ocean branding.
